name: Master Brain
description: Master Brain is turn-based concentration card game and can be played as a one or two player game. A set of card is placed face down and the players turn over two at a time, they have to find a matching pair. If a match is found those card are removed and the player has another go. If two cards are unsuccessfully matched the cards are placed face down once again and the next player goes. The game has three different skill levels.
gamePlay: Cards / tiles, Mental training, Tile matching puzzle

shot.caption: One of card sets - spectrum heroes.
